document.title: Oral History. Anna Maria Bruzzone Archive - Ravensbrück series. Int...
document.intro: Anna Maria Bruzzone Archive - Ravensbrück series. Interview with Lidia Beccaria Rolfi. The spoken variety is the Regional Piedmontese Italian. Local lexical forms are sometimes adopted. Other languages (French, German) are occasionally used for specific terms. The spoken variety is the Regional Piedmontese Italian. time aligned transcript

resourceOwner.title: Università degli Studi di Siena, Archivio Storico dell'Ospedale Neuropsichiatrico di Arezzo, Arezzo (AR), Italy
